remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 对菜单或 上的相关项进行分组。Use a to group related items on a menu or . 将自动以水平或垂直方向或垂直方向或垂直方向。The is automatically spaced and oriented horizontally or vertically to accord with its container. 您可以在设计时通过从下拉列表中选择来添加 。You can add a at design time by choosing it from a drop-down list. 不过，还可以通过在设计器模板节点或 方法中键入连字符（-）来自动创建 。However, you can also automatically create a by typing a hyphen (-) in either the designer template node or in the method.

MenuStrip Control (Windows Forms)

related.span: 如何：向 ToolStripMenuItem 添加增强功能
